en.title: Using For Loops
en.description: Learn how to use for loops in Python.
en.content:
The for loop is used to iterate over a sequence.

  • Works with lists, strings, etc.
  • Executes code for each item
fruits = ['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']
for fruit in fruits:
    print(fruit)

en.title: Match-Case Operator
en.description: Use match-case for pattern matching.

fr.title: Opérateur Match-Case
fr.description: Utilisez match-case pour la correspondance de motifs.

es.title: Operador Match-Case
es.description: Usa match-case para coincidencia de patrones.

en.title: Pattern Matching with Match-Case
en.description: Learn the match-case statement in Python.
en.content:
The match-case statement performs pattern matching.

  • Like switch-case in other languages
  • Available in Python 3.10+
  • Supports multiple patterns
day = "Monday"
match day:
    case "Monday":
        print("Start of work week")
    case "Friday":
        print("TGIF")
    case _:
        print("Another day")

fr.title: Correspondance de Motifs avec Match-Case
fr.description: Apprenez l’instruction match-case en Python.
fr.content:
L’instruction match-case effectue une correspondance de motifs.

  • Comme switch-case dans d’autres langages
  • Disponible en Python 3.10+
  • Prend en charge plusieurs motifs
jour = "Lundi"
match jour:
    case "Lundi":
        print("Début de semaine de travail")
    case "Vendredi":
        print("TGIF")
    case _:
        print("Un autre jour")

es.title: Coincidencia de Patrones con Match-Case
es.description: Aprende la declaración match-case en Python.
es.content:
La declaración match-case realiza coincidencia de patrones.

  • Como switch-case en otros lenguajes
  • Disponible en Python 3.10+
  • Soporta múltiples patrones
dia = "Lunes"
match dia:
    case "Lunes":
        print("Inicio de semana laboral")
    case "Viernes":
        print("¡Viva el viernes!")
    case _:
        print("Otro día")

ar.title: مطابقة الأنماط مع Match-Case
ar.content:
تقوم جملة match-case بمطابقة الأنماط.

  • مثل switch-case في لغات أخرى
  • متاحة في بايثون 3.10+
  • تدعم أنماط متعددة
day = "Monday"
match day:
    case "Monday":
        print("بداية أسبوع العمل")
    case "Friday":
        print("شكراً للجمعة")
    case _:
        print("يوم آخر")

en.title: Day of Week
en.description: Use match-case to determine weekend or weekday
en.code:
day = "Saturday"
match day:
    case "Saturday" | "Sunday":
        print("It's weekend!")
    case "Monday" | "Tuesday" | "Wednesday" | "Thursday" | "Friday":
        print("It's a weekday")
    case _:
        print("Invalid day")

    case "Lundi" | "Mardi" | "Mercredi" | "Jeudi" | "Vendredi":
        print("C'est un jour de semaine")
    case _:
        print("Jour invalide")
